I am Caleb Crawley, a full stack web developer.
My primary coding skills include:

What makes me unique is I am self motivated, coachable, and versatile. Much of my coding experience comes from projects working with real companies to create websites and admin systems, sometimes alone or with a team.
I meet deadlines and am an avid communicator with whoever I am working with or for.
